resources.string:
The purpose of this app is to improve your intuition for numbers and make you better at Math.


It's based on a Johns Hopkins University study published in the Journal of Experimental Child Psychology (Volume 147, July 2016, Pages 82â€“99).


The results of this study showed that improving intuition for numbers caused an improvement in Math ability.


You can read about this study at the link below. It includes a short YouTube video that shows you how this study was done.
 http://www.eurekalert.org/pub_releases/2016-06/jhu-asn061516.php
